definitions.title: adj. fleeing
definitions.body: ( = …[[בַּרִּיחַ]]) :[[נׇחָשׁ בָּרִֽחַ]] Job 26:13 of eclipse-dragon, [[לִוְיׇתָן נָחָשׁ בָרִחַ]] Is 27:1 (prob. fig. of Assyrians); as subst. [[בָּרִיחִים]] Is 43:14 as fugitives (for other views cf. Comm.); so prob. also Is 15:5 [[בריחיה]], v. [[בְּרִיחַ]].
